property.name: membertype
property.label: Member Type
property.description: Use this attribute to indicate the entity being modified/created. Eg : Debtor, Secured Party, Assignor, etc.

property.name: newUCCId
property.label: newUCCId
property.description: Use this attribute to pass UCC Filing record ID.This will be used to associate all entities created. Eg : Debtor, Secured Party, Assignor, etc.

property.name: UCCLienSecuredParty
property.label: UCC Lien Secured Party
property.description: This gives the list of secured party associated with the current UCC filing record.

property.name: typedescription
property.label: Description
property.description: Use this description to display related information about the member type being created/ modified.

property.name: selectedLienType
property.label: selectedLienType
property.description: specifies the Lien type selected for filling
